synthesis_analysis: The system excels at validation and providing practical, low-pressure strategies, building trust and offering clear next steps. Its main weakness is addressing symptoms over root causes, often missing opportunities to explore core fears or manage physiological anxiety. To improve, it should pair actionable advice with gentle inquiry into underlying assumptions and better calibrate challenge pacing to individual readiness. The priority is evolving to provide more personalized, root-cause addressing strategies that consolidate wins before introducing new pressures.
